whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: GARSOCAR S.A.S was founded in 2017 with the goal of engaging in foreign trade activities, particularly promoting and marketing Colombian products in international markets and vice versa.
whoWeAre.extra: To date, Garsocar S.A.S has developed the export and commercialization of equipment, accessories, raw materials, and tools for the production of alternative energy such as wind, solar, thermal, and biofuel energy.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To be a leader in the export and import market by developing operations of any nature related to foreign trade, as well as any similar or complementary activity that facilitates the development of the company's trade and industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: By 2026, to be consolidated as a leading company in the international trade sector, specializing in alternative energies, recognized for the quality of our services and our commitment to sustainable development.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: We are committed to the highest quality standards in all our international trade services.
